fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Background 
Name:   
Hoang My 
Gender:  
Female 
Date of birth:   
January 10th, 1982 
Marital status:   
Married 
Education 
Graduated from Douglas Mawson Institute of Technology, Adelaide, South Australia. 
Specialist: Information Technology – Software Developer 
Certificate: MCTS 70–630 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007, 2013 
Configuration 
Working experience: 16 years 
September 2003 up to now:  
Developer: 3 years 
Test Leader: 3 years 
Project Manager: 10 years 
Product Owner: 2 years 
From 2003 – 2005: Developer -  IT&T  
From 2005 - 2006: Test Leader - CMC 
From 2006 - 2008: Test Leader - Bamboo Solutions Corp 
From 2008 till 2016: Senior PM - Bamboo Solutions Corp 
From 2017 till now: Product Owner – Niteco 
 Love to build project/product to be more than expected. Provide ideal and priority product 
backlog 
 Project Manager/Product Owner or Business Analysist role 
 Prepare/Support billing and costing document 
 Own product vision to detail and clarify product features/direction by User Story and MVP 
document 
 Develops feature requirements and works with the team to define acceptance criteria 
 Define and deliver minimum viable products, adding key features incrementally 
 Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget 
 Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders 
and ensuring technical feasibility 
 Ensure resource availability and allocation 
 Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress 
 Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using appropriate 
verification techniques 
 Measure project performance using appropriate tools and techniques 
 Report and escalate to management as needed 
 Successfully manage the relationship with the client and all stakeholders 
 Perform risk management to minimize project risks 
 Establish and maintain relationships with third parties/vendors 
 Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation

Team work, Reliable, Ethical. 
Good and experience in communication, problem solving. 
Experienced in and willing to work under high pressure. 
 Was a key member in establish Vietnam Office for US company from 2006 till now. 
 Is a Bridge PM, Product Owner between US and VN team. Report to US Technical Director.  
1 year working experiences in US. 
As a Scrum master/ Product Owner/PM between VN/UK team in Sweden company. Manage 
client/stakeholder expectation and project progress. 
Good in management and building an effective Development team.  
Manage a team include 20 staffs with good Testing & Development process. 
Can run two projects at the same time and meet deadline. 
Clarify PRD Support Customer via Support Center, Community site. 
Can work in non-working hours (at night) if needed or a part-time job.
